page.title: 19INDUSTRY
page.content: The Industrial Site Dynamett Ltd. are a company that put glue onto wrappers,cigarettes,nappies, envolopes,dishwashing powder,furniture ,Weetabix boxes,shortbread and cookie boxes.The glue is useless until it is turned into liquid.The hotter it gets the runnier it gets. Acorn Printers. Acorn printers print light boxes for house of frasers stores such as Rackhams and Harrods. Bounceabouts bouncing castles Bounceabouts bouncing castles have been on the site since September 1984.They supply castles to Hospitals Leisure centres,Fair grounds,piers, Butlins,Pontins,Ladbrokes,first leisure corporation private individuals.They export all over the world.
